name: blazikenite
effect: Held: Allows Blaziken to Mega Evolve into Mega Blaziken.
short_effect: Held: Allows Blaziken to Mega Evolve into Mega Blaziken.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Blaziken hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
